oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Goodness gracious, Miss Agnes : patchwork of country living
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Knox, Lera,1896-
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Knoxville, Tenn. : Newfound Press, University of Tennessee Libraries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lera Knox, born Lera Margaret Ussery, recalls her life starting from pioneer days in Middle Tennessee through the early years of her marriage and career as a newspaper reporter for the Nashville Banner, Columbia Daily Herald, and Maury Democrat. A city girl, she married a farmer, Alex Knox, and had two children, Margaret and Jack.
First publication of Newfound Press, a digital imprint of the University of Tennessee Libraries.
xiii, 380 p., ill., file size: 4.13 MB
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Open access publication. May be printed and downloaded without prior permission as long as the original work is credited.
